title: Intra-individual Comparison of PET Scans on the Biograph Vision 600 With the New Biograph Vision.X PET/CT
description_brief: The main purpose is to evaluate initial clinical experiences and to explore whether the Vision.X system yields improved image quality and diagnostic performance compared to Vision 600.
explanation_target: Reason: The trial compares two PET/CT imaging systems (Biograph Vision 600 vs Biograph Vision.X) to evaluate image quality and diagnostic performance. This is a diagnostic device comparison (non-therapeutic), not a drug or therapeutic intervention, so it does not fit any of the four treatment categories (disease-targeted biologic, disease-targeted small molecule, cognitive enhancer, or neuropsychiatric symptom improvement).

Act: Key extracted details from the trial description and web sources — the Biograph Vision.X is a next-generation PET/CT scanner by Siemens Healthineers (industry-leading 178 ps time-of-flight, improved spatial resolution and ~20% performance gain) offered as an upgrade to the Biograph Vision family; the Vision 600 is part of the Biograph Vision family.
